arq.ste.edx package

Submodules

arq.ste.edx.edx module

class EDX

Bases: arq.ste.eds.EDS[arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType, Dict[arq.ste.edx.edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXValueType], arq.ste.edx.edx.EdsType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXValueType], Generic[arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType, arq.ste.edx.edx.EdsType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXValueType]

An interface representing an encrypted dictionary scheme.

abstract generate_key() → arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType

Generates a key for the encrypted dictionary scheme.

Returns

a key

abstract encrypt(key: arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType, plaintext_ds: Dict[arq.ste.edx.edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.edx.DXValueType]) → bytes

Encrypts the given plaintext dictionary with the given key and returns a byte string representing the encrypted dictionary.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with, as generated from generate_key()

  • plaintext_ds¶ – the plaintext dictionary to encrypt

Returns

a serialized encrypted dictionary

abstract load_eds(eds_bytes: bytes) → arq.ste.edx.edx.EdsType

Deserializes a byte string representing an encrypted dictionary into the type needed by the query() algorithm.

Parameters

eds_bytes¶ – a serialized encrypted dictionary from encrypt()

Returns

a deserialized version of the encrypted dictionary

abstract token(key: arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType, keyword: arq.ste.edx.edx.DXKeyType) → bytes

Generates a search token for the given key and keyword.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • keyword¶ – the keyword to query the encrypted dictionary with

Returns

a search token

abstract query(token: bytes, eds: arq.ste.edx.edx.EdsType) → Optional[bytes]

Returns a result for the given search token queried over the given encrypted dictionary.

Parameters

  • token¶ – a search token generated by token()

  • eds¶ – the encrypted data structure from load_eds()

Returns

a serialized response to pass to resolve()

abstract resolve(key: arq.ste.edx.edx.KeyType, response: bytes) → arq.ste.edx.edx.DXValueType

Resolves the serialized response returned by the server into a native List[DXValueType].

If the encrypted dictionary is response-hiding, the given key is also used to decrypt the response.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • response¶ – the serialized response from query()

Returns

a list of plaintext values

arq.ste.edx.simple_edx module

class SimpleEDXKeyPurpose(value)

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Internal class denoting the purpose of a key; used to consistently derive the same key in operations.

HMAC = 0

Purpose for a key used for encryption operations.

ENCRYPT = 1
class SimpleEDX(*, dx_key_serializer: arq.ste.serializers.serializer.Serializer[arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXKeyType] = <arq.ste.serializers.pickle_serializer.PickleSerializer object>, dx_value_serializer: arq.ste.serializers.serializer.Serializer[arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXValueType] = <arq.ste.serializers.pickle_serializer.PickleSerializer object>, encryption_scheme: arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.symmetric_encryption_scheme.SymmetricEncryptionScheme = <arq.ste.symmetric_encryption.simple_symmetric_encryption_scheme.SimpleSymmetricEncryptionScheme object>, hashing_scheme: arq.ste.hash_functions.hash_function_scheme.HashFunctionScheme = <arq.ste.hash_functions.simple_hash_function_scheme.SimpleHashFunctionScheme object>, key_length: int = 16)

Bases: arq.ste.edx.edx.EDX[bytes, Dict[bytes, bytes], arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXValueType], Generic[arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXKeyType, arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXValueType]

Implements a simple encrypted dictionary scheme based on the Pi_bas encrypted multimap scheme from [CJJJKRS14].

dx_key_serializer: Serializer[arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXKeyType]
dx_value_serializer: Serializer[arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXValueType]
encryption_scheme: SymmetricEncryptionScheme
hashing_scheme: HashFunctionScheme
key_length: int
generate_key() → bytes

Generates a key for the encrypted dictionary scheme.

Returns

a key

  • keyword¶ – the keyword to query the encrypted dictionary with

  • eds¶ – the encrypted data structure from load_eds()

Returns

a serialized response to pass to resolve()

resolve(key: bytes, response: bytes) → arq.ste.edx.simple_edx.DXValueType

Resolves the serialized response returned by the server into a native List[DXValueType].

If the encrypted dictionary is response-hiding, the given key is also used to decrypt the response.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • response¶ – the serialized response from query()

Returns

a list of plaintext values
